Articles.Content:
Hi,

I've had a Kerbal mission to Duna, which brought along my first rover.

After driving a bit, I inevitable wound up dumping the whole works.

Both Kerbals appear to be off the vehicle standing, and I can select each of them. Howver I can't move or do anything with them. They just stand there and not responding.

Any ideas?

Thanks

ZF-

Edited February 8, 2015 by Zad Fnark
Fixed

Yep, it happens. Give this a try: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/75586-Master-Thread-Unresponsive-Kerbals-in-EVA

It's a bit dated, but still applies to 0.90.

Cheers,

~Claw

In Sandbox, I "Terminate" them through the Tracking Station, as they appear back on the Crew Roster.

I don't know about Career, though.
Thanks Claw. I used your mod and it worked like a charm. The data file looked like a zoo to rummage through.
